attributes.additional_details: Sunderland Council have threatened to closure of Camex House Hendon Sunderland Tyne & Wear.  Camex House provides a vital service to the communty it serves, providing valuable care and attention for the most needy in society,The Homeless, Alcohol Dependant and Drug Users many of whom would not be alive if Camex House did not exist.  Many reasons for its closure have been heard including too much money paid to one landlord but none that make sense.  The police want to see Camex House kept open.  We would like to see pressure applied to Sunderland council to see that Camex House does not close and a safe and stable home is continued to be provided for the needy.
